revision.text: == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 1 hour 23 mins 20 secs || 2 hours 43 mins 20 secs || 4 hours 1 min 40 secs || 5 hours 30 mins - 11 hours |- !Animation | <center> [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || <center> [[File:BelueTreeTaller.png|50px]] || <center> [[File:BelueTreeBloom.png|50px]] || <center> [[File:BelueTreeBerry.png|50px]] |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
